summary: The ConnectionOptions.connectionTimeout parameter is being ignored when creating a client connection, causing connections to always timeout at the default 10 seconds instead of the specified value.
userImpact: Users cannot configure connection timeout values shorter than the default 10 seconds, breaking applications that need faster timeout behavior.
rootCause: The connectionTimeout parameter in ConnectionOptions is not being properly applied to the connection establishment logic.
resolutionDetails: The connectionTimeout configuration parameter was properly integrated into the connection establishment flow.
keyQuote: The ConnectionOptions.connectionTimeout seems to be ignored... the timeout is still 10 seconds
